snippet: An outstanding group of opera singers paid tribute to Richard Tucker at Avery Fisher Hall on Sunday.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews tribute to Richard Tucker, including appearances from Stephanie Blythe, Joyce DiDonato, Renee Fleming, Susan Graham and Eric Owens and featured members of Metropolitan Opera Orchestra, at Avery Fisher Hall,
lead_paragraph: An outstanding group of opera singers paid tribute to Richard Tucker at Avery Fisher Hall on Sunday.

headline.seo: Richard Tucker Gala at Avery Fisher Hall
headline.main: For a Tenor’s Centennial, Celebrating His Legacy With a Cast of Opera Stars
headline.print_headline: For a Tenor’s Centennial, Celebrating His Legacy With a Cast of Opera Stars
